QuestData.Title: Rellen, the Learned
QuestData.Description: Bring your offerings to the central den. You may witness the legend of Rellen, the Learned, who gave centaur our livelihood as we know it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Make your offerings in the offering den and witness each of Rellen's teachings.
QuestData.RewardText: Rellen established the centaur's footing in these plains. We would have never survived without his teachings.
